translated: Then again, the light rays of the collection of seed syllables invite the hosts of heroes and dakinis, who enter into oneself.

original: yang de nyid kyi 'od zer gyis 'gro pa dag par byas nas slar log ste /
analyzed: yang de nyid kyi 'od zer gyis 'gro pa dag par byas nas slar log ste /
translated: Again, the light rays of that purify migrators and return.

analyzed: sngags kyi phreng ba de nyid la gzhug pa dang / yid dang dag gi dbye bas bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra by means of the division of mind and speech, having entered into that very mantra rosary.

original: de nas bam yig gi 'od zer gyis sa gsum dang / lus dang yi ge rim gyis bsam gyis mi khyab par zhugs pa sngon du 'gro bas de kho na nyid bsgom par bya'o //
